Package ohos.agp.components

Interface Component.DraggedListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Component

    public static interface Component.DraggedListener
    Provides callbacks to be invoked when a drag event is dispatched to a component by a gesture recognizer.
    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onDragCancel​(Component component, DragInfo dragInfo)
      process a drag cancel event dispatched to the component.
      void onDragDown​(Component component, DragInfo dragInfo)
      Process a drag down event dispatched to the component.
      void onDragEnd​(Component component, DragInfo dragInfo)
      Process a drag end event dispatched to the component.
      default boolean onDragPreAccept​(Component component, int dragDirection)
      Accepts the drag event dispatched to a component.
      void onDragStart​(Component component, DragInfo dragInfo)
      Process a drag start event dispatched to the component.
      void onDragUpdate​(Component component, DragInfo dragInfo)
      Process a drag update event dispatched to the component.

    • Method Detail

      • onDragDown

        void onDragDown​(Component component,
                DragInfo dragInfo)
        Process a drag down event dispatched to the component.
        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the component to which the drag down event is dispatched.
        dragInfo - Indicates the drag down info object DragInfo.

        dragInfo - Indicates the drag start info object DragInfo.

      • onDragCancel

        void onDragCancel​(Component component,

        process a drag cancel event dispatched to the component.
        Parameters:

        dragInfo - Indicates the drag end info object DragInfo.

      • onDragPreAccept

        default boolean onDragPreAccept​(Component component,
                                int dragDirection)
        Accepts the drag event dispatched to a component.

        This method supports the Component.DRAG_HORIZONTAL, Component.DRAG_VERTICAL and Component.DRAG_HORIZONTAL_VERTICAL. When Component.DRAG_HORIZONTAL_VERTICAL is set, the drag direction may be rough.

        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the component to which a drag event is dispatched.
        dragDirection - Indicates the drag direction, which can be Component.DRAG_UP, Component.DRAG_DOWN, Component.DRAG_LEFT, or Component.DRAG_RIGHT.
        Returns:
        Returns true (default value) if the current drag event is accepted; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        4
